```{r}
#shallow water subset
shallow <- subset(nitrogen_data, Zone == "Shallow")

#mesophotic subset
mesophotic <- subset(nitrogen_data, Zone == "Mesophotic")
```

```{r}
#MHI subset
MainHI <- subset(nitrogen_data, Region == "MHI")

#NWHI subset
NwestHI <- subset(nitrogen_data, Region == "NWHI")
```

```{r}
#MHI subsets
MHI.shlw <- subset(MainHI, Zone == "Shallow")
MHI.meso <- subset(MainHI, Zone == "Mesophotic")

Oahu <- subset(MainHI, Location =="Oahu")
Maui <- subset(MainHI, Location =="Maui")
Niihau <- subset(MainHI, Location =="Niihau")
Molokai.meso <- subset(MainHI, Location =="Molokai")
Oahu.shlw <- subset(MHI.shlw, Location =="Oahu")
Maui.shlw <- subset(MHI.shlw, Location == "Maui")
Oahu.meso <- subset(MHI.meso, Location =="Oahu")
Maui.meso <- subset(MHI.meso, Location =="Maui")


#NWHI subset
NWHI.shlw <- subset(NwestHI, Zone =="S")
NWHI.meso <- subset(NwestHI, Zone =="M")
```

```{r}
Halimeda.MHI <- subset(MainHI, Genus =="Halimeda sp.")
```


```{r}
write.csv(MHI.shlw, ".\\MHI.shlw.csv")
write.csv(MHI.meso, ".\\MHI.meso.csv")
write.csv(NWHI.shlw, ".\\NWHI.shlw.csv")
write.csv(NWHI.meso, ".\\NWHI.meso.csv")
```
